headline: How Strong Q3 Results and GEK800 Engine Milestone May Influence Kratos (KTOS) Growth Trajectory
summary: Kratos Defense & Security Solutions reported strong third quarter results, raising its full-year 2025 and 2026 revenue guidance and announcing robust progress in unmanned systems with the successful GEK800 engine test alongside GE Aerospace. This achievement underscores Kratos' ability to deliver both rapid innovation and meaningful financial momentum, especially in the evolving defense technology market. We’ll examine how the raised revenue outlook and GEK800 engine breakthrough impact...
